title: Brudenell Hotel launched new website at AldeburghTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Brudenell Hotel launched new website at Aldeburgh Published on : Tuesday, July 7, 2015
A dynamic new website launched by the Brudenell Hotel at Aldeburgh, Suffolk is the first developed by Guestline featuring their reduced step online booking platform, which represents a full digital solution from website to booking engine.
Guestline, market leaders in hospitality software, has given the site a fresh, new, mobile responsive design. The site features a booking platform that is highly visible, quick and easy for potential guests to book in two simple steps.
Its easy-to-use interface and content management system (CMS) allows the Brudenell to edit and upload rates, promotions and events faster than ever before. In addition, the booking module is PCI compliant and provides a safe and secure method of storing and processing credit card details.
Delighted with their new website Peter Osborne, General Manager at the Brudenell Hotel said; “We are confident the customer friendly navigation and new booking facility will generate more direct bookings. We will be able to set and manage live rates so guests can be assured of the best possible prices on our website. With the facility to add promotions and events ourselves from the CMS, the site will always be up-to-date and optimised to generate additional revenue.
“As more lookers are converted into bookers we look forward to a reduction in online travel agencies (OTA) commissions and a corresponding increase in our rate of return. Looking ahead, we expect higher occupancy levels and an increase in room rates”, adds Peter.
Phil Davidson, Managing Director at Guestline, commented; “With nearly half the visitors to OTAs also going directly to the hotel’s website, it is imperative hotels have eye-catching, easy to navigate pages to convert these visitors into customers.
Source:-Brudenell Hotel
